hanzi-su-wiki:
質

Значения

Качество, свойство; залог, заклад; расспрашивать, выяснять

Мнемоника

  • Топоры 斤 одинаковой стоимости 貝. Император Цинь-Ши Хуан узаконил их вес и размеры во избежание использования крестьянами как оружие. Дома разрешалось иметь лишь лёгкие топорики.

  • "Я расколол большую раковину двумя топорами и изучил её качество."

Варианты

质, 貭
purpleculture_pinyin:
zhì
character; nature; quality; plain; to pawn; pledge; hostage; to question; Taiwan pr. [zhi2]
персонаж; природа; качественный; простой; закладывать; приносить присягу; заложник; на вопрос; Тайвань пр. [zhi2]
rtega_mnemonic:
質質RS
X		quality, verify, question, pawn
  • small ax 斤 cuts made into gold and silver coins 貝 to verify the inner quality
 問

質質RS
质质		matter, material, substance, quality
  • at the entrance of the city one's materials are axed 斤斤 to control for quality and one has to pay taxes 貝/贝
問
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 质)
Antonyms: 量
Pictophonetic: 斦 indicates the sound; 貝 (shell) conveys the meaning.

heisig_chinese_memo: What is this substance on this clam? I've already broken 2 axes on it! Must be high quality whatever it is!
heisig_constituent: substance, axe, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight, axe2
koohiiStory1: What is this substance on this clam? I´ve already broken 2 axes on it! (Good question...質問).
koohiiStory2: Another keyword that I do not like by Heisig. 質【しつ】 (n,n-suf) quality. Story: Your at a local ax dealer and you have TWO AXES which you are testing for QUALITY by trying to split CLAMS right down the opening. Picture yourself succeeding with one AX and then some weird SUBSTANCE comes out of the shell...eww (I don´t like clams).
kunYomi: たち、ただ.す、もと、わりふ
jp_example_words:
気質(かたぎ): spirit, character, trait, temperament, disposition
質疑(しつぎ): question
実質(じっしつ): substance, essence
質素(しっそ): simplicity, modesty, frugality
蛋白質(たんぱくしつ): protein
人質(ひとじち): hostage, prisoner
品質(ひんしつ): quality
本質(ほんしつ): essence, true nature, reality
良質(りょうしつ): good quality, superior quality
質(しつ): quality
性質(せいしつ): nature, property, disposition
素質(そしつ): character, qualities, genius
地質(ちしつ): geological features
物質(ぶっしつ): material, substance
質問(しつもん): question, inquiry
jp_readingExamples: 質問 (しつもん), 質実 (しつじつ), 本質 (ほんしつ), 質屋 (しちや), 人質 (ひとじち)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You have to use two axes to open these shellfish. That seems like overkill, but it is necessary. These particular shellfish are of very high quality meaning they won't open so easily.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine the highest quality shellfish you've ever seen. They're hard, smooth, and basically impenetrable.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You finally get all of the shellfish open and you're admiring their quality, when your shih tzu (しつ) jumps up on the table and gobbles them down. NO! You try to chase after the little dog, but it's too late. They're gone.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: I guess your shih tzu knows good quality shellfish too. :(
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 斤 (катти), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese:
zhì: (сущ) качество; природа, характер
zhì: (графема) материя, вещество; простой; спрашивать, допрашивать; (книжн.) закладывать; (книжн.) залог, заложник
Kanshudo_mnemonic: two axes (斤) can make the shellfish (貝) better quality
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A shield made of shellfish would be considered high quality and expensive.

②樸素，單純：質樸。質直。

④抵押或抵押品：人質。
⑤古同“贄”，禮物。

質字的基本解释

質
zhì
见“质”。

質字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》之日切，入質，章。］
［《廣韻》陟利切，去至，知。］
亦作“儨1”。“质1”的繁体字。亦作“貭1”。
(1)以财物抵押或留人质担保。
(2)留作抵押或保证的人或物。
(3)质地；物质。
(4)形体；外貌。
(5)底子。
(6)主，主体。
(7)性质；本质。
(8)素质；禀性。
(9)质量。
(10)朴实；淳朴。
(11)犹少，简略。
(12)诚信；真实。
(13)盟信，盟誓。
(14)古代贸易契券的一种。
(15)对质；验证。
(16)询问；就正。
(17)评量；评断。
(18)相当，对等。
(19)对手；对象。
(20)四寸的箭靶。泛指箭靶。
(21)泛指目标。
(22)弓弣，弓把。
(23)星名。
(24)称，衡量。
(25)马来语sělat的音译。海峡。
(26)古代数学称立方。
(27)质学。即化学。
(28)“礩”的古字。柱础。
(29)古代刑具。后作“鑕”。

質字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　質； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1210第07
【唐韻】之日切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】職日切，?音桎。【易·繫辭】原始要終，以爲質也。【註】質，體也。　又【詩·小雅】民之質矣。【傳】質，成也。【朱傳】實也。又【大雅】虞芮質厥成。【傳】質，成也。成，平也。【疏】三字義同，故以質爲成，以成爲平。【朱傳】質，正。成，平也。　又【詩·小雅】發彼有的。【傳】的，質也。【疏】十尺曰侯，四尺曰鵠，二尺曰正，四寸曰質。鵠及正、質，皆在侯中也。　又【周禮·地官·質人】大市曰質，小市曰劑。【註】質劑者，爲之券藏之也。　又【儀禮·士冠禮】質明行事。【註】質，正也。【禮·月令】黑黃蒼赤，莫不質良。【註】所染者當得眞采正善也。又【聘義】君子於其所尊，弗敢質。【註】質謂正自相當。　又【禮·曲禮】質君之前。【註】質猶對也，　又【廣雅】質，地也。【禮·禮器】禮釋回增美質。【註】質，猶性也。　又【公羊傳·定八年】弓繡質。【註】質，拊也。　又【史記·范睢傳】不足以當椹質。【註】質，剉刃也。　又【前漢·張釋之傳】具以質言。【註】

Basic explanation of words
quality
zhì

quality
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
[The date of "Guangyun" is cut, into the quality, chapter. ]
["Guangyun" Zhili cut, go to, know. ]
Also known as "儨1". Traditional characters of "质1". Also known as "貭1".
(1) Mortgage of property or hostage guarantee.
(2) The person or thing reserved as a mortgage or guarantee.
(3) Texture; material.
(4) Body; Appearance.
(5) Foundation.
(6) The main body.
(7) Nature; essence.
(8) Quality; Disposition.
(9) Quality.
(10) Simple; simple.
(11) It's still rare, simple.
(12) Honesty; truthfulness.
(13) Alliance letter, pledge.
(14) A kind of ancient trade bond.
(15) Confrontation; verification.
(16) Ask; just right.
(17) Evaluation; Judgment.
(18) Equivalent, equal.
(19) Opponent; object.
(20) Four-inch target for archery. Refers to the archery target in general.
(21) Refers to the goal in general.
(22) Bow, bow handle.
(23) Star name.
(24) Weigh, measure.
(25) The transliteration of Malay sělat. Strait.
(26) Ancient mathematics is called cube.
(27) Qualitative science. That is chemistry.
(28) The ancient word "礩". Pillar foundation.
(29) Ancient instruments of torture. Later as "锧".
quality

[Tang Yun] Daily Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Job Day Cut,? Sounds. [Yi·Xi Ci] The original is to end, and it is also regarded as the quality. [Note] Quality, body also.　[Poetry·Xiaoya] The quality of the people. 【Transfer】Quality, success. [Zhu Chuan] Actually. Also 【Daya】Yu Ruizhi has succeeded. 【Transfer】Quality, success. Cheng, Ping also. 【Sparse】The three characters have the same meaning, so the quality is the quality and the flat is the same. [Zhu Chuan] Quality, right. Cheng, Ping also.　[Poetry·Xiaoya] It's something. [Biography], quality. 【Sparse】Ten feet means Hou, four feet means Hu, two feet means righteousness, and four inches means quality. Hu, integrity and quality are all in Hou Zhongye.　[Zhou Li·Diguan·Pledgor] The big city is called quality, and the small city is called agent. [Note] Those who are quality agents are kept for their coupons.　[Yi Li·Shi Guan Li] Act clearly. 【Note】Quality, righteousness. 【Rite·Moon Order】Black, yellow, blue, red, and good quality. [Note] Those who are infected should be respectful of righteousness. Also 【Employment】A gentleman is respected by him, and he dares to challenge him. [Note] The quality is said to be self-equivalent.　 [Li·Qu Li] Before the quality of the king. [Note] The quality is still right, 　 and [Guangya] The quality is also the ground. 【Rite·Ritual Vessel】Ritual release increases the beauty. вм. 质

質

Значения

Качество, свойство; залог, заклад; расспрашивать, выяснять

Мнемоника

  • Топоры 斤 одинаковой стоимости 貝. Император Цинь-Ши Хуан узаконил их вес и размеры во избежание использования крестьянами как оружие. Дома разрешалось иметь лишь лёгкие топорики.

  • "Я расколол большую раковину двумя топорами и изучил её качество."

Варианты

质, 貭

Radicals: 斤, 貝  (axe, shellfish)
Meaning Mnemonic
You have to use two axes to open these shellfish. That seems like overkill, but it is necessary. These particular shellfish are of very high quality meaning they won't open so easily.
Imagine the highest quality shellfish you've ever seen. They're hard, smooth, and basically impenetrable.
Reading Mnemonic
You finally get all of the shellfish open and you're admiring their quality, when your shih tzu (しつ) jumps up on the table and gobbles them down. NO! You try to chase after the little dog, but it's too late. They're gone.
I guess your shih tzu knows good quality shellfish too. :(
